`MultipleDubboConfigBindingProperties` has been removed, however, spring-configuration-metadata.json still works on IDEA.

Before Spring Boot Starter 0.2.1 or 0.1.2, you have to add a new configuration property: 
```properties
dubbo.config.multiple=true
```
not valid bug any longer, since we remove the web-fragment.xml completely.

I have checked this problem, because the size of the original queue is 1024, which is not enough in some scenarios (especially in the case of stress testing). So I will increase the size to Integer.MAX_VALUE.
